synopsis.text:
In the whimsical world of Keifuku-san, a young girl dressed as a railway conductor and her loyal floating manta ray companion embark on a series of adventures in a realm beyond our own. The duo explores ethereal landscapes, with the manta ray harboring doubts about their prolonged wait for something or someone near the celestial entrance of a Shinto shrine.

Directed by Tatsuki and brought to life by the talented team at irodori animation studio, including animator Hirayasu and art director Yukko, this heartwarming anime short combines earlier footage with new epilogue scenes. The video features the voice talents of Yumiri Hanamori as the young conductor, who diligently prepares a delivery while her manta ray companion remains steadfastly by her side. Prepare to be enchanted by this unique and captivating tale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
